issue.title: [R] Implement options for non-bound MatchSubstringOptions kernels
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13869](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13869). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Other kernels which do not have options fully implemented:
 \* count_substring - MatchSubstringOptions
 \* count_substring_regex - MatchSubstringOptions
 \* ends_with - MatchSubstringOptions
 \* starts_with - MatchSubstringOptions

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13869?focusedCommentId=17414776) by Nicola Crane (thisisnic):*
Issue resolved by pull request 11102
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11102>
